go_data.justification: Transferrin is known to bind iron ions, although this is not explicitly stated in the provided text, it is a well established fact about transferrin.
Transferrin recycling to the plasma membrane is mentioned, indicating its presence in recycling endosomes.
Transferrin is loaded into early endosomes in the experiment described.
The process of loading transferrin into early endosomes implies involvement in receptor-mediated endocytosis.
